Function.Description: The set function allows values to be stored in the specified ObjectRepository by key.

Brief.Overview: The set function allows values to be stored in the specified ObjectRepository {aGor} by key. Any value may be stored in the ObjectRepository and associated with key. Both the key and the stored value may be of arbitrary complexity. An object may be removed from the ObjectRepository by storing the value #void in association with its previous key.
Brief.Usage: The set function can save an object in the Object Repository by key.

Argument.Name: key
Argument.Note: The key to be associated with the new value.

Argument.Name: newValue
Argument.Note: The new value to be associated with the key.
